activeTarget.title: Active Target
activeTarget.description: Variable to set when pin becomes active

inactiveTarget.description: Variable to set when pin becomes inactive

analogValueTarget.title: Value Target
analogValueTarget.description: Variable to set with the measured value.

digitalValueTarget.description: Variable to set with active/inactive digital value.

filterTime.title: Filter Time(s)
filterTime.description: Filter averaging time in seconds, happens before any other processing.

deepSleepWake.title: Deep Sleep Wake
deepSleepWake.description: If set, pin will wake the device from deep sleep if it becomes active. Some pins may not support this, some chips may only allow one wake pin.

hysteresis.title: Hysteresis
hysteresis.description: Hysteresis in scaled units, used to convert to digital value.

analogHysteresis.title: Analog Hysteresis
analogHysteresis.description: If set, apply hysteresis to the analog value as well as the digital value.

deadband.title: Analog Deadband
deadband.description: Deadband around zero, applies to the analog value.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Multiplier to convert to raw value to the actual measurement.

zeroValue.title: Zero Value
zeroValue.description: Offset in scaled units that is considered zero.

autoZero.title: Auto Zero
autoZero.description: If set, automatically zero the value at boot and attempt to correct long term drift, if drift is below zeroValue.

driftSpeed.title: Drift Speed(s)
driftSpeed.description: Expected speed for approx 63% change due to drift

referencePin.description: Output used as a reference, to measure conductance.  Use for matrix reading, capsense, etc.
